retail.message: For retail orders, the minimum order amount in the basket must be 20 AZN or more.

wholesale.message: For wholesale orders, the minimum order amount in the basket must be 100 AZN or more.

report.title: Report
report.deliveryNote: The final amount may vary based on the weight of the delivery.

contactUs.title: Let's get in touch
contactUs.description: By providing your phone number below, our team will contact you and finalize the items in your basket.

contactSuccess: Great! We will get back to you shortly.

phoneNumber.message: Incorrect format (+994 XX XXX XX XX)
